name: istanbul

a city that was the capital of Turkey until 1923: Istanbul used to be called Constantinople. His family migrated to Istanbul when he was 11.
More examplesFewer examplesShe was travelling from Istanbul to Ankara.He is a political scientist at Bilgi University in Istanbul.There are many minarets on the Istanbul skyline.
